Algorithms
Data structures
Computing network
Cryptography
Shell Commands
Firefox Tricks
Linear search efficiency is linear O(n) time.
Binary search efficiency is logarithmic O(lg n) time.
Bubble sort efficiency is quadratic O(n2) time.
A stack is a LIFO/LIFO data structure.
A queue is a FIFO/LILO data structure.
Stack essential attributes: data, top pointer.
Queue essential attributes: data, front and rear pointers.
A dictionary is a collection of key-value pairs.
A linked list node has both data and link fields.
An array is a static memory allocation data structure.
A linked list is a dynamic memory allocation data structure.
Array access is constant O(1) time.
Linked list access is linear/sequental O(n) time.
Binary signals can be sent over radio signals, fiber optic cables or even by hand signals.
Physical – Transmission and reception of raw bit streams over a physical medium
Data Link – Reliable transmission of data frames between two nodes connected by a physical layer
Network – Structuring a multi-node network, including routing, addressing and traffic control
Transport – Transmission of data segments between points on a network – The pigeon carrying the message
Session – Managing persistent forms of connection between nodes
Presentation – Translating data into a form that can be transmitted
Application – High-Level interfaces for representing data
Mnemonic for OSI (Open Systems Interconnection) Model: Please Do Not Throw Sausage Pizza Away
Internet Relay Chat is an application layer protocol for the transfer of text messages.

A certificate authority or certification authority (CA) is an entity that issues digital certificates. A digital certificate certifies the ownership of a public key by the named subject of the certificate.
A public key certificate consists of a public key, an identifier of the key owner and the whole block signed by a certificate authority (CA).
Methods to distribute public keys include public announcement, a publicly available directory, public key authority and public key certificates
A digital signature is an authentication mechanism that enables the creator of a message to attach a code that acts as a signature.
Cryptographic hash functions are used for message authentication, digital signatures, one-way password files, intrusion detection, virus detection and PRNGs.
A Man-In-The-Middle (MITM) attack is where an attacker secretly relays and possibly alters the communications between two parties communicating with each other.
Public key or asymmetric cryptography uses a public key for encryption and a private key for decryption.
Type \'ls\' to list directories in Powershell (windows) or Terminal (Unix-like)
Type \'cd\' with the directory name to move into the directory in Powershell (Windows) or Terminal (Unix-like).
Type \'pushd\' to go into a directory then \'popd\' to go back to the directory where \'pushd\' was used in Powershell (Windows) or Terminal (Unix-like).
Type \'mkdir\' with the directory name to create a directory in Powershell (Windows) or Terminal (Unix-like).
Create a file using \'touch\' and the filename in Terminal (Unix-like systems).
Type \'cp\' with the current directory of the file you wish to copy and the destination in Powershell (Windows) or Terminal (Unix-like).
Type \'mv\' with the current directory of the file you wish to move and the destination in Powershell (Windows) or Terminal (Unix-like).
Press CTRL + SHIFT + M to enter Responsive Design View (useful for web developers)
Press SHIFT + F2 then type \'restart\' to restart Firefox.
Type \'about:config\' in the address bar and enable media.mediasource.enabled and media.mediasource.mp4.enabled to have full HTML5 Youtube playback.
The profile folder can be found by going to Help>Troubleshooting Information>Application Basics
If Firefox is running slowly, go to Help>Troubleshooting Information and select “Refresh Firefox”
To change profiles in Firefox on a Windows system, run \'firefox -ProfileManager
To change profiles in Firefox on a Unix-like system, run \'firefox –ProfileManager\'
Genetics
DNA
Cell Structure
The nucleus is the largest organelle in the cell.
The nucleus is found in all eukaryotic cells except mature phloem sieve tube elements and red blood cells
The nucleus is typically spherical, may be ovoid or lobed
The nucleus is capable of dividing prior to cell division, such that daughter cells will each get a nucleus.
The nucleus functions as a control centre for activities of the cell
The nucleus contains DNA that carries the instruction for protein synthesis.
The nuclear envelope is composed of 2 membranes separated by a fluid-filled space of 25nm.
The outer membrane of the nuclear envelope is continuous with another organelle, the endoplasmic reticulum.
The nuclear envelope is perforated by nuclear pores lined by a protein octet.
Translation: Process by which a sequence of bases in an mRNA molecule is converted into a sequence of amino acids in a polypeptide chain
Translation begins when an rRNA molecule within the ribosomes recognises and binds to a ‘start’ sequence on the mRNA
mRNA stands for messenger ribonucleic acid
mRNA is synthesised during transcription
The base sequence of the mRNA is complementary to that of the DNA it is transcribed from
tRNA stands for transfer ribonucleic acid
tRNA is synthesised in the nucleus and exists nucleus to cytoplasm for translation to occur
Gene: Heritable sequence of nucleotides along a DNA molecule which codes for a polypeptide
A gene can be regarded as a basic unit of inheritance
Allele: An alternative form of a gene that can be present on either one or both of a pair of homologous chromosomes
Genotype: Genetic constitution of an organism that produces a phenotype
Phenotype: Observable physical and chemical characteristics of an individual
Gene pair: Refers to the two allele of a particular gene present in a diploid cell
The Law of Supply states that the higher the price of a good, the higher the quantity supplied of the good, ceteris paribus.
子曰：“学而时习之，不亦悦乎？有朋自远方来，不亦乐乎？人不知而不愠，不亦君子乎？”
有子曰：“其为人也孝悌而好犯上者，鲜矣。不好犯上而好作乱者，未之有也。君子务本，本立而道生。孝悌也者，其为仁之本与？”
子曰：“巧言令色，鲜矣仁。”
曾子曰：吾日三省乎吾身。为人谋而不忠乎？与朋友交而不信乎？传不习乎？
子曰：道千乘之国，敬事而信，节用而爱人，使民以时。
子曰：弟子入则孝，出则悌，谨而信，泛爱众而亲仁，行有余力，则以学文。
子夏曰：贤贤易色，事父母，能竭其力。事君，能致其身。与朋友交，言而有信。虽曰未学，吾必谓之学矣。
弟子规，圣人训 首孝弟, 次谨信 泛爱众，而亲仁 有余力，则学文
父母呼，应勿缓 父母命，行勿懒 父母教，须敬听 父母责，須我承
冬则溫，夏则清 晨则省，昏则定 出必告，返必面 居有常，业无变
事虽小，勿擅为 苟擅为，子道亏 物虽小，勿私藏 苟私藏，亲心伤
亲所好，力为具 亲所惡，谨为去 身有伤，貽亲忧 德有伤，貽亲羞
亲爱我，孝何难 亲憎我，孝方贤 亲有过，谏使更 怡吾色，柔吾声
谏不入，悅復谏 号泣隨，撻无怨 亲有疾，药先尝 晝夜侍，不离床
性相近也，习相远也
过而不改，是谓过矣
己所不欲，勿施于人
言必信，行必果
凡是人，皆須爱 天同覆，地同載 行高者，名自高 人所重，非貌高
无心非，名为錯 有心非，名为惡 过能改，归於无 倘掩飾，增一辜
闻过怒，闻誉樂 损友来，益友卻 闻誉恐，闻过欣 直諒士，漸相亲
Formula
Facts
Quantities
Electromagnetism
Nuclear Physics
Line Spectra
Magnetic flux through an area is defined as the product of the component of the magnetic flux density normal to the area and the area.
Magnetic flux, φ = BAcosΘ, where Θ is the angle between the normal to the area and the direction of magnetic flux density.
The weber is the magnetic flux of a uniform magnetic field of flux density 1 T passing through a plane surface area of 1 m^2 normally.
Magnetic flux linkage through a coil is the product of the number of turns of the coil and the magnetic flux through one turn.
Magnetic flux linkage, Φ = NBAcosΘ, where N is the number of turns of the coil.
Faraday\'s law states that the magnitude of the induced e.m.f. is directly proportional to the rate of change of magnetic flux linkage.
In a closed circuit, the charge that flows can be determined by E = change in fux linkage / time.
mass m kg
length l m
time t s
electric current I A
thermodynamic temperature T K
amount of substance n mol
acceleration a m s–2
acceleration of free fall g m s–2
activity of radioactive source A Bq
Gravitational field is a region of space where a mass experiences a force. The direction of the field is the direction of force on mass
Gravitational field lines are lines representing the direction of a force on a point mass in a gravitational field
The force of attraction between two point masses is directly proportional to the product of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of their separation
The gravitational constant is 6.67 x 10^-11
A geostationary satellite is one which will always remain vertically above a single fixed point on Earth\'s equator
Gravitational field strength g at a point in the field is defined as the force per unit mass experienced by a small test mass placed at that point in the field
Gravitational force is a conservative force
Hooke\'s Law: F=ke
The change in length e of a material is directly proportional to the resultant force F applied, provided the limit of proportionality has not been exceeded.
For constant mass, F = ma
Rate of Change in Momentum = Change in momentum divided by the time taken for the change.
Change in Momentum = Final Momentum – Initial Momentum
S = k ln W
The existence of discrete energy levels within the isolated atoms is suggested by observing that various gases can produce line spectra.

Emission line spectrum is characterized by coloured lines on dark background. The coloured lines are photons of various frequencies emitted by the hot gas. Each colour represents the energy of a photon emitted.
The fact that only certain discrete colours (energies) are emitted suggests that within the atom there are discrete energy levels.

Absorption line spectrum is characterized by dark lines on coloured background. The dark lines are photons of various frequencies that are absorbed by the cool gas and subsequently re-radiated out uniformly in all directions. Each dark line represents the energy of a photon absorbed.
Energy level of a hydrogen atom, En = 13.6 / n^2 x eV, n = 1, 2, 3…
The ground state energy of an atom is the most stable state where the electron is most likely to be found.
Visible light : V I B G Y O R. violet ≈ 400 nm => energy of a photon ≈ 3.1 eV, red ≈ 700 nm => energy of a photon ≈ 1.8 eV.

Gamma decay usually occurs alongside alpha or beta decay. This occurs when unstable, excited nucelus de-excites to a lower, ore stable energy state by emitting a gamma ray photon. Gamma decay does not change the proton or neutron number of the original nucleus.
Activity is the actual rate of disintegration of the radioactive nuclei (per second).
Count rate is the number of radioactive emissions per unit time detected by the detector (e.g. by the GM tube).
Activity (also called the rate of decay) is found by A = -dN/dt, where N is the number of radioactive nuclei present.
Law of decay: The rate of decay is directly proportional to the number of radioactive nuclei present. The constant of proportionality is the decay constant, λ: A = λN.
Half life is defined as the time taken for half the number of radioactive nuclei present to decay.
The activity of a mixture of radioactive isotopes is the sum of activity of each radioactive isotope.
Equilibria Fact
Thermodynamics
A system that has a high degree of disorder or randomness is said to have high entropy.
Higher entropy is observed if there are more ways to distribute particles in space or available energy among the particles.

The number of ways to distribute the particles or energy depends on the number of particles, the orderliness of particles in different physical states as well as the temperature at which the particles are in.
Entropy of a system increases when a system becomes more disordered.
Entropy is a state function like enthalpy and is dependent on the states of the reactants and products.
A defined universe is made up of the system and surrounding.
The system is a well-defined part of the universe under study, a quantity of matter of fixed identity, around which we can draw a boundary
An irreversible reaction proceeds in one direction until one of the reactants is used up.
Time for the system to reach equilibrium is dependent on the rates of the forward and backward reactions
Heterogeneous Equilibrium: The substances involved in the reaction are in at least 2 or more physical states.
The Equilibrium Law: It is the mathematical relationship which relates the amount of the species in an equilibrium mixture in terms of concentrations or partial pressures.
The Equilibrium constant is a constant value at any given temperature.
The Equilibrium constant is a constant value at any given temperature.
Equilibrium contants are not affected by changes in concentration or pressure of reactants or products.
Isotopes are atoms of the same element with same number of protons but different number of neutrons.
Mole is the amount of substance containing same number of particles there are atoms in 12g of pure carbon-12.
Avogadro constant is equals to 6.02 x 10²³ mol⁻¹
Molar volume is the volume occupied by 1 mole of gas.
Stoichiometry is the relationship between the amounts of reactants and products involved in a chemical reaction.
Limiting reagent is the reactant that is completely used up in a reaction.
Standard solution contains a known amount of solute in a given volume of the solution.
Statistics
Evidences
The Singaporean education system was described as world-leading and picked out for commendation by British education minister Michael Gove.
Singapore\'s education system consists several specialised streams to better cater to all students.
The Integrated Program (IP) and International Baccalaureate Program (IB) allow opportunities for students who excel to easily further advance their skills.
Normal Technical (NT) and Normal Academic (NA) streams cater to students who require more focus on the basics.
Gifted Education Program (GEP) nurtures gifted students from a younger age.
Sports help us rest, keep fit and relax in the work-driven society of Singapore.
Facebook earns $1 billion annually as of 2010 from hosting advertisements alone.
“The press and politicians. A delicate relationship. Too close and danger ensues. Too far apart and democracy itself cannot function.” – Howard Brenton, English playwright

\"The media\'s the most powerful entity on earth. They have the power to make the innocent guilty and to make the guilty innocent, and that\'s power. Because they control the minds of the masses.\" - Malcolm X, American human rights activist
\"The more social media we have, the more we think we\'re connecting, yet we are really disconnecting from each other.\" - JR, French artist
\"Social media is the ultimate equalizer. It gives a voice and a platform to anyone willing to engage.\" - Amy Jo Martin, American author
\"Whoever controls the media, controls the mind.\" - Jim Morrison, American poet
\"Technology and social media have brought power back to the people.\" - Mark McKinnon, American political advisor
NUS is ranked 5th worldwide (QS World Ranking 2014) for Chemical Engineering.
NUS is ranked 9th worldwide (QS World Ranking 2014) for Computer Science & Information Systems.
NUS School of Computing is ranked 1st in Asia (QS World Ranking 2014).
An estimated $91.3 million from the Sporting Singapore Fund (SSF) will be allocated to support Sports initiatives under Vision 2030.
The number of arts companies almost tripled from 302 in 2003 to 856 in 2011 while the number of museums doubled from 28 in 2004 to 56 in 2011. (Singapore Cultural Statistics 2012)
In Budget 2013, a sizeable amount of $1.3 billion was allocated to Ministry of Culture, Community and Youth ​(MCCY) to bolster the arts scene in Singapore.
Populations
Lithosphere
The core: Inner and outer core, outer liquid about 3500km radius, inner solid about 1255km
The core is heavy and dense, and nickel-iron alloy called Nife
The Gutenberg Discontinuity: Separates core from mantle, zone of discontinuity
The Gutenberg Discontinuity: Slowing of seismic waves in region
The Mantle: Lithosphere, Asthenosphere and Mesosphere
The Mantle: Deepest solid layer is mesosphere, the semi-molten layer is the asthenosphere, the solid layer above, including crust, is lithosphere
The Mantle: The rigid lithosphere is broken into plates which can move over the molten asthenosphere
Only about 1% of the water on Earth is fresh water that is available for human use
China has 21% of the world population but only 7% of the world’s freshwater
World population tripled while the water demand increased by 6 times
135 million people could die from water-related diseases by 2020
Total construction cost of Columbia Regional Wastewater Treatment Plant was $51 million and another $3 million worth of equipment
Singspring Desalination Plant at Tuas costs $200 million to construct
In Asia cereal production doubled between 1970 and 1975, yet the total land area cultivated with cereals increased by only 4 percent.
Population density refers to the number of people living in per square kilometer of the land
Population explosion is a sudden rapid rise in the number of people (increase is increasing) ·
Population stagnation is no increase in Rate of Natural increase and population numbers ·
Population stagnation is no increase in Rate of Natural increase and population numbers ·
Birth rate is the number of live births per 1000 people per year (no. of births / population x 1000).
Total Fertility Rate is number of children a woman is expected to have in her child-bearing years (15 – 49 years old) [No. of babies / No. of mothers]
Ideal TFR is 2.1, to replace father and mother and adults that are childless.
Math Rules
Facts
Facts
d/dx sin x = cos x
d/dx cos x = - sin x
d/dx tan x = sec^2 x
d/dx sin f(x) = [cos f(x)] f\'(x)
d/dx cos f(x) = [- sin f(x)] f\'(x)
d/dx tan f(x) = [sec^2 f(x)] f\'(x)
cos^2 x + sin^2 x = 1
If y = ku, dy/dx = kdu/dx
Sum/difference rule: If y = u ± v, dy/dx = du/dx ± dv/dx
Product rule: If y = uv, dy/dx = v(du/dx) + u(dv/dx)
Chain rule: If y = u ± v, dy/dx = du/dx ± dv/dx
Quotient rule: If y = u/v, dy/dx = [v(du/dx) - u(dv/dx)]/(v^2)
If y = g(u) and u = u(x), dy/dx = dy/du x du/dx
dy/dx = 1/(dy/dx)
It is one of the most fundamental concepts in Mathematics
f:X |--> Y is f maps to Y
A function f is a rule or relation which assigns each and every element of x∈X to one and only one element y∈Y
A set of x-values are called inputs
A set of y-values are called outputs or images
Inputs are the domain of function f, Df
Outputs are the range of function f, Rf
The Law of Supply states that the higher the price of a good, the higher the quantity supplied of the good, ceteris paribus.
The Law of Demand states that the higher the price of a good, the less people will demand that good, ceteris paribus.
An externality is the cost or benefit that affects a third party.
Market failure occurs when markets fail to implement all the gains or welfare improvement that can be achieved through voluntary exchange.
A public good is a good that is non-rivalrous and non-excludable in consumption.
A public good is a good that is non-rivalrous and non-excludable in consumption.
